page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN SOUTHREPPS
page.content:
Mr. Roger Codling, Church Farm -housebuilder and restorer. est 1964
Mr. T. E. Bird, Sycamore House - car repairs - est. 1971.
Mrs. Mary Young, Ham House. - potter, sculptress and music teacher - est. 1968
Mr.Alan Young, Ham Youse - manufacturers load-cells for car makers all over the world - est. l970.
Mr.Harry Chapman, High Street - sale and repair of welding machines, employs 8 people, est 1978.
Mr. B. E. Drury & Son, "Greenways" - haulage contractor - est. 1945, employs l4 people.
